title: Login Error
body:
This problem has been persisting for 18 days now and after trying to reinstall the game and with the new patch 7.15 being released, it hasn't resolved my problem.   

Every time I try to Login into the game i get this error " An unexpected error occurred while logging in.  Please try again.  If this issue persists, contact support".   

Does anybody have any solutions or tips to solve this problem?  Will be very appreciative if anyone has advice.

replies.body: Your network sounds like it's having a hard time being able to reach out authentication servers, so after it tries getting through for a bit it fails and sends this error message. Let's check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first, making sure to update your firewalls and port settings along the way.
